related.meaning: sebuah pandangan, sekilas, tatapan; pertemuan pertama

lessons.japanese: 丘の上に立っているので彼の家は見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: Situated on a hill, his house commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: 丘の上に建っているので彼の家は見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: Situated on a hill, his house commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: その部屋は湖の見晴らしがすばらしい。
lessons.indonesian: The room commands a fine view of the lake.

lessons.japanese: その丘は見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: The hill commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: そのホテルは見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: The hotel has a good prospect.

lessons.japanese: そのホテルは丘の上にあるので、見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: Standing as it does on the hill the hotel commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: この部屋からは町の見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: This room commands a fine view of the city.

lessons.japanese: このように丘の上にあるので、その教会は見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: Standing as it does on a hill, the church commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: このとおり丘の上にあるので、その家は見晴らしがいい。
lessons.indonesian: Standing as it does on a hill, the house commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: 霧が立ちこめて見晴らしがきかなかった。
lessons.indonesian: A curtain of mist blocked our view.

lessons.japanese: 彼の家は丘の中腹にあって、見晴らしがすばらしい。
lessons.indonesian: His house stands on the hill-side and commands a splendid view.

lessons.japanese: 私の家は丘の上にあるので、見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: My house, located on a hill, commands a fine view.

lessons.japanese: 丘の上に立っているので彼の家は見晴らしがよい。
lessons.indonesian: Situated on a hill, his house commands a fine view.
